lead_paragraph: The Obama administration approved Michigan’s request to extend Medicaid coverage to about 15,000 more children and pregnant women in Flint, where the water supply has been contaminated with lead.

headline.print_headline: Michigan: Medicaid Is Extended to 15,000 Exposed to Lead in Flint
headline.main: Michigan: Medicaid Is Extended to 15,000 Exposed to Lead in Flint

snippet: The Obama administration approved Michigan’s request to extend Medicaid coverage to about 15,000 more children and pregnant women in Flint, where the water supply has been contaminated with lead.
abstract: Michigan's request to extend Medicaid coverage to around 15,000 additional children and pregnant women exposed to water contaminated with lead in Flint is approved by Obama administration.
